mapper.insert: INSERT INTO movie (name, director, actor, types, cover, year, language, rating, users, summary, video,create_time) VALUES (#{name}, #{director}, #{actor}, #{types}, #{cover}, #{year}, #{language}, #{rating}, #{users}, #{summary}, #{video},#{createTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE movie SET name = #{name}, director = #{director}, actor = #{actor}, types = #{types}, cover = #{cover}, year = #{year}, language = #{language}, rating = #{rating}, users = #{users}, summary = #{summary}, video = #{video} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM movie ORDER BY rating DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{size}
